Container.Name: plex-releases-summary
Container.Overview: Fetches recently added media from Plex via Tautulli and sends summaries to Discord. Minimal configuration: 2 required fields (Tautulli URL and API key). Smart defaults: checks last 7 days, runs weekly on Sundays at 4pm. Optional settings available via config.yml.
Container.Requires: Minimal setup: 1) Tautulli running and accessible, 2) Download config.yml template from GitHub and add to appdata with your Tautulli URL and API key. Environment variables must be referenced in config.yml. See README for configuration guide.

Config.Name: AppData Config Path
Config.Description: Path containing config.yml. Download template from GitHub and configure with your settings.

Config.Name: Tautulli URL
Config.Description: Tautulli server URL (required). Must be referenced in config.yml as 'tautulli_url: ${TAUTULLI_URL}'.

Config.Name: Tautulli API Key
Config.Description: Tautulli API key (required). Can be file path or direct value. Find in Tautulli: Settings → Web Interface → API. Must be referenced in config.yml.

Config.Name: Discord Webhook URL
Config.Description: Optional: Discord webhook URL or path to file containing URL. Leave empty to disable notifications (default). Uncomment in config.yml to enable.

Config.Name: Days Back
Config.Description: Optional: Days to look back for releases (default: 7). Uncomment in config.yml to override default.

Config.Name: CRON Schedule
Config.Description: Optional: CRON schedule (default: '0 16 * * SUN' = Sunday 4 PM). Uncomment in config.yml to override default.

Config.Name: Run Once
Config.Description: Optional: One-shot mode ('true') or scheduled ('false', default). Uncomment in config.yml to override default.

Config.Name: Plex URL
Config.Description: Optional: Plex server URL for links (default: https://app.plex.tv). Uncomment in config.yml to override default.

Config.Name: Log Level
Config.Description: Optional: Logging level (DEBUG, INFO, WARNING, ERROR). Default: INFO. Uncomment in config.yml to override default.
